MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL40 postcode area of Dolgellau affecting properties in Nant Y Gader, Cader Road, Towyn Road and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a grounded overhead line on Cader Road and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:43am on 12th February 2021.
